alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 8:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...SOME SLIPPERY SPOTS POSSIBLE ON UNTREATED SURFACES FOR INTERIOR PARTS OF THE REGION... The area has some surface temperatures near or slightly below freezing. There is potential for some light freezing rain or freezing drizzle and potential for whatever moisture is leftover to freeze on untreated surfaces this evening. As a result, some icy spots could develop, resulting in locally slippery conditions. There is forecast for some snow or a rain and snow mix to develop late this evening into overnight. Motorists should proceed with extra caution when traveling this area. Allow for extra room between vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven
